Class NodeServicesConnector

    public class NodeServicesConnector
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors.AbstractConnector
implements NodeServicesCI
    The class NodeServicesConnector implements the connector for the required interface NodeServicesI.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void acceptOrPass(StandardMessage m)
      accept (and process the message) or transmit it to the next node in the ring; method used for point-to-point communication.
      void broadcast(StandardMessage m)
      broadcast the message over the ring overlay network.
      void connectAsFirstNode()
      connect the current node as the first in the ring i.e., its node services outbound port is connected to its inbound port.
      void connectNextNode(java.lang.String nextRIPURI)
      connect the node component with the given reflection inbound port URI as the new next node in the ring.
      void connectToNewNext(java.lang.String newNextIBPURI)
      connect the outbound port of the current node component to the inbounbd port of the given URI.
      void disconnectNode()
      disconnect the node from the ring.
